Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

Class EventController

java.lang.Object
com.example.syntaxeventlottery.EventController
public class EventController extends Object
The EventController class manages the business logic for handling Event objects in the Event Lottery System. It interacts with the EventRepository to perform CRUD operations and additional functionalities, such as managing participant lists and sending notifications.

      Fetches the locations of all participants for a given event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event.
      callback - The callback to handle the list of LatLng locations.

      public void refreshRepository(DataCallback<Void> callback)
      Refreshes the local repository of events.
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback to handle the refresh result.

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(Event event, @Nullable android.net.Uri imageUri, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Adds a new event to the repository, including uploading an optional image and generating a QR code.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object to add.
      imageUri - The Uri of the event poster image (optional).
      callback - The callback to handle the operation result.

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event event, @Nullable android.net.Uri imageUri, @Nullable android.graphics.Bitmap qrCodeBitmap, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Updates the details of an existing event in the repository.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object with updated details.
      imageUri - The Uri of the new event poster image (optional).
      qrCodeBitmap - The updated QR code as a Bitmap (optional).
      callback - The callback to handle the operation result.

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(Event event, DataCallback<Void> callback)
      Deletes an event from the repository.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object to delete.
      callback - The callback to handle the operation result.

    • getEventById

      public Event getEventById(String eventId)
      Retrieves an Event by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Event object matching the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getOrganizerEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getOrganizerEvents(String organizerID)
      Retrieves a list of events organized by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      organizerID - The ID of the organizer.
      Returns:
      A list of Event objects organized by the specified user.

    • addUserToWaitingList

      public void addUserToWaitingList(Event event, String userID, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Adds a user to the waiting list of a specified event. Validates the input, checks for duplicate participation, and ensures the waiting list is not full.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object representing the event to which the user is being added.
      userID - The unique ID of the user being added to the waiting list.
      callback - The DataCallback to handle the result of the operation.

    • removeUserFromEvent

      public void removeUserFromEvent(Event event, String userID, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Removes a user from all relevant lists in the specified event. This method is invoked when a user opts to leave the event or is removed.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object from which the user is being removed.
      userID - The unique ID of the user being removed.
      callback - The DataCallback to handle the result of the operation.

    • setUserCancelled

      public void setUserCancelled(Event event, String userID, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Sets the specified user as a cancelled entrant in the event.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object containing the user's participation.
      userID - The unique ID of the user to cancel.
      callback - The DataCallback to handle the result of the operation.

    • addUserToConfirmedList

      public void addUserToConfirmedList(Event event, String userID, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Adds a user to the confirmed list for the event.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object containing the user.
      userID - The unique ID of the user to confirm.
      callback - The DataCallback to handle the result of the operation.

    • performDraw

      public void performDraw(Event event, android.content.Context context, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Performs a draw on the waiting list of the event, selecting participants.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object for which the draw is being performed.
      context - The Context of the calling activity.
      callback - The DataCallback to handle the result of the operation.

    • performRedraw

      public void performRedraw(Event event, android.content.Context context, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Redraws participants from the waiting list in the event of cancellations.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object for which the redraw is being performed.
      context - The Context of the calling activity.
      callback - The DataCallback to handle the result of the operation.
